item.title: Kikopup Weekly Insight Notes
item.description: A lot of people believe that dogs should set up a pecking order, and then the humans should respect that order. However, what can happen is that the small arguments, intimidating glares and scuffles can go on forever. Some of the dogs feel the need to protect what they have, while others live in fear of stepping into the wrong place at the wrong time. This can actually sometimes be more stressful for the bullying dog than the dog being bullied.
